div.p: GLEASON GRADE (SECONDARY) is the same as attribute GLEASON GRADE where additional grades are present.
The value is presented in the range 2-5.

Note: GLEASON GRADE (SECONDARY) records the highest grade (Biopsy) or the second most extensive grade (TURP (Transurethral resection of the prostate) and radicals). If no additional grades are present, GLEASON GRADE (PRIMARY) and GLEASON GRADE (SECONDARY) are the same.
